title: Pezroly
author: Pezroly
content: Bitcoin price will drop - altcoin Tether USDT TRC20 transfer time 3 - 4 minutes + 0.2$ Fee. And Tether USDT TRC20 have stable price too. If you use TRON in the same wallet, transfer fee is 0 for up to 5 daily transfers, if want more, then need TRON staking for three days. Currently Tether USDT TRC20 wallet on TRON network is supported by Tronlink wallet only ( TRON and Tether USDT TRC20 ).
